text: @charliekirk11 Fighting risk of coronavirus and preserving thousands of american lifes isn't love for America? Rep. Will Hurd and 12 other Republicans, said that  “building a physical wall... is the most expensive and least effective way to secure the border.” That's Charlie's love for America!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
